title: Assumed Breach Penetration Test
description: A penetration tester is given a standard user account and tasked with seeing if they can achieve a specific objective, simulating an attacker who has already stolen credentials.

tasks.description: Log in with the provided standard user credentials.
tasks.expected_outcome: Tester successfully logs into the network.

tasks.description: Enumerate internal network shares and applications accessible to the standard user.
tasks.expected_outcome: Tester maps out what a standard user can see and access.

tasks.description: Discover a network share that is misconfigured to allow all authenticated users to read sensitive documents, achieving the test's objective of accessing sensitive data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Tester finds a critical misconfiguration and demonstrates its impact.
